title: Gift of the Magpie
description: After ten years, Amanda’s heart still smarts from the humiliating aftermath of their perfect high-school Valentine’s Day date. But when Camden Lancaster moves in across the street—and doesn’t recognize her on their first two encounters—she thinks it’s safe to be his fair-weather neighbor.  Boy is she in for the surprise of the summer.   Written for the General Market (G) (I): Contains little or no; sexual dialogue or situations, violence, or strong language. May also contain some content of an inspirational/religious nature. Similar romance novels in this genre may be categorized christian romance, inspirational romance, prime romance, and clean, wholesome romance.
author: Zoe M. McCarthy
